hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Forest Temple Boss Key#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Epona is an exceptional horse. Able to clear canyons in a single bound.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Bomb Bag# and #the Song of Time#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Forest Temple Boss Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Arrows (5 pieces)# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Mirror Shield#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #Morpha#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Hylian Shield# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Here's a hint, @. Don't be bad.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Purple Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block Fourth Chest

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Water Temple## has #1# major item.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #an Ice Trap#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Invisible Enemies Chest

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs# including an Upgrade one.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #Dampé's Grave#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Zora Tunic#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Ice Arrows# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Zora Tunic#.
